comments:
Description:
SWTException when conduct operation in report parameter.

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a parameter without default value.
2. Preview in Layout, input parameter value, and back to Layout designer.
3. Preview in Layout again.
4. Click Cancel in parameter dialog
5. Click Report Parameter button to pop up parameter dialog again.
6. Input value and click OK in parameter dialog.

Result:
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed
